FAQs.question: What is MODMANIA?
FAQs.answer: MODMANIA is a custom console design brand that transforms your PlayStation or Xbox with personalized modifications, including colors, textures, lighting, and exclusive accesories.

FAQs.question: Are the mods just skins or full hardware changes?
FAQs.answer: We offer both! Choose between high-quality vinyl skins or full custom shell replacements, LED, lighting, and controller modifications.

FAQs.question: Will modding my console void the warranty?
FAQs.answer: Yes, in most cases, any physical modification may void your manufacturer warranty. We recommend only modding out-of-warranty consoles or doing it after the warranty expires.

FAQs.question: Can I send my own design or idea?
FAQs.answer: Absolutely. We support custom requests. Just upload your concept and our design team will work with you to bring it to life.

FAQs.question: Do you mod controllers as well?
FAQs.answer: Yes! We customize controllers with new shells, RGB lighting, button remapping, and paint finishes that match your console.

FAQs.question: How long does the modding procces take?
FAQs.answer: Depending on the complexity of your request, it typically takes 5-10 bussiness days from the moment we receive your console.
